current.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

settings.content_need_help: Need help? We're available at 86-1341-845-6516 - Email us at: info@vxdas.com or Live Help
settings.content_footer_1: VXDAS.com have a long lasting tire with globally trusted express companies, such as: DHL, UPS, EMS, FedEx, TNT, Singapore post. VXDAS promises to ship the packages ASAP and in a good packaging.
settings.content_footer_2: VXDAS.com is available with the most trustable and safest payment options:  PayPal, Western Union and bank transfer. We are always doing our best to take our customers a safe and easy shopping experience.
settings.content_footer_3: Only after fully tested and quality control procedures, device can ship to customers, ensuring each and every item purchased meets quality standards.
settings.content_footer_4: VXDAS customers are free to contact us by live chat, Email, Skype and whatsapp to get technical support.

settings.title: What Do Our Customers Say ?
settings.quote: The Piwis 2 hardware is samtec hardware interface, with V18.150.500 software installed on Panasonic CF30 full set ready to use, my technician work it on Panemera 2012, rear end elctronic programming, we have the code for offline programming, all works perfect

settings.answer_faqs:
-Unlike most Chinese export companies, there is no minimum order restriction. You can buy products in any order quantity - even 1 piece samples - from a wide selection of the latest released products. So you can test products and find out about the details of importing from vxdas.com before you're committed to any large orders;

-You can pay by credit card through Paypal, which offers total buyer protection and avoids having to share any of your financial information;

-Dropshippers can send single items directly from vxdas.com to their customers.

-All the products you buy from vxdas.com are covered by a 12 month guarantee, and are carefully inspected for quality before packing

- which is one additional level of QA over and above what is done in the factory;

-You're supported by friendly English speaking staff before and after placing an order, and you can get full product information and support even before purchasing;

-Your goods are packed carefully, and the packages are correctly labelled and accompanied by all the paperwork that's needed for smooth clearance through your country's Customs.

-When you pay for orders on vxdas.com you do not need to share any of your confidential financial details with vxdas.com and you're protected by Paypal's money back guarantees;

-Vxdas.com belongs to CNDIAG TECHOLOGY CO,. LTD ,which is an officially registered company in Hong Kong;

-The vxdas.com website is certified "Hacker Safe" by Scanalert and is also verified by Validated Site.

-View FAQs and submit help tickets (we aim to answer all tickets within 1 working days)

-you can call us from Monday to Friday 09:00-18:00 GMT 8+ on saturday and sunday.

-You can also email info@vxdas.com directly.
This is a Shopping Guide, please kindly check

settings.des_faqs:
If you have any doubts about importing from China, you're right to be cautious. Here's some key information about vxdas.com to give you more confidence in starting out with your new China Wholesale supplier:

Vxdas.com is a wholesaler , based in the city of Shenzhen in Mainland China. Goods are shipped to worldwide by air freight and couriers such as DHL and UPS.

Default.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
